publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years.
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Mr Keith Raffan*

S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Raffan
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Raffan, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Fiona McLeod*

S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Raffan, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Fiona McLeod, Dr Richard Simpson*
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Raffan, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Fiona McLeod, Dr Richard Simpson, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-312 Challenge Cup (lodged on 22 November 1999) Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Raffan, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Fiona McLeod, Dr Richard Simpson, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Keith Harding

S1M-312 Mr Nick Johnston: Challenge Cup—That the Parliament extends its congratulations to Alloa Athletic in beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle yesterday and winning their first major honour in over 100 years. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Raffan, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Fiona McLeod, Dr Richard Simpson, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Keith Harding
